description.value:
Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Knockback], you can attempt an Athletics check against your target's Fortitude DC.

Critical Success You gain the critical success effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove], then the critical success effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] against the target.

Success You gain the success effect of a Shove, then the success effect of a Trip against the target.

Failure You gain the normal effect of Knockback.
